intro: Polypogon × clausonis, commonly known as the hybrid false brome, is a grass species resulting from the cross between Polypogon monospillus and Polypogon borealis. It is a perennial plant native to the northeastern United States, typically found in moist, open habitats such as meadows and woodlands.
